description: Detects use of Wlrmdr.exe in which the -u parameter is passed to ShellExecute
name: Wlrmdr Lolbin Use as Laucher
query: ((process.executable:*\\wlrmdr.exe AND process.command_line:*\-s\ * AND process.command_line:*\-f\ * AND process.command_line:*\-t\ * AND process.command_line:*\-m\ * AND process.command_line:*\-a\ * AND process.command_line:*\-u\ *) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\winlogon.exe")))
author: frack113
